abstractText: All kokanee produced at the Cabinet Gorge Fish Hatchery since 1997 have been marked by thermal mass-marking techniques (or cold branding) described by Volk et al. (1990). Therefore, hatchery kokanee of all ages should contain distinct thermal marks. This method describes how we analyze kokanee for these marks and determine hatchery and wild components.
title: LPO Kokanee Otolith Thermal Mark Analysis v1.0
